testsuite.name: Simple test to check the login functionality of CAS

testcase.name: Simple test to check the login functionality of CAS the user successfully logs into the CES with admin credentials and CAS shows the profile page
testcase.classname: the user successfully logs into the CES with admin credentials and CAS shows the profile page

failure.message: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find element: `h1[data-testid=login-header]`, but never found it.

testcase.name: Simple test to check the login functionality of CAS after a successful login, the ID from the LDAP entry is used as the user ID and not the user name entered by the user.
testcase.classname: after a successful login, the ID from the LDAP entry is used as the user ID and not the user name entered by the user.
